Fixed-point supports.brief: The library implementation q_1 to q_31 fixed-point number formatting.

No divider operator.brief: The implementation was not required hardware divide operator.

Chrono formatting.brief: The library provides RTC time formatting.

String operators.brief: The library provides few string operators include append, replace, search, etc.

Build-in heap manager.brief: The library provides an optional build-in heap manager for embed system.
